name: Car Transporter Simulator 2017
description:
Car Transporter Simulator

Download Car Transporter Simulator Game and Play our new "FREE" game.

You are a Transporter! Your job is to transport Cars, big containers and big trucks from the Truck Parking.

Car transporter 3D truck simulation is a new kind of cargo tailer game where you need to load and unload the high value racing cars and sports cars on top of your car transporter loader.

So deliver the cars in this amazing car transporter truck simulator game and become the best truck driver of your city.

Car Transporter Flying Game for FREE and feel the most excellent Heavey loded truck flight experience of your life!

Key Features:

=> Easy to use driving controls
=> Improve Airplane Flight Ability 
=> Stunning HD 3D Graphics
=> Excellent Parking Levels => Superb sound effects.
